title: Wtf this is some major ranked BS!!
body: So today I played a game of ranked, normal game right.....about 10 minutes in my modem catches on fire and I DC (clearly not on purpose). So i get back on 40 minutes later find that the game has finished and we actually won!. I also find i lost 45 (double lp loss ) for accidental DC even thou we WON!!! and I also had 5  LOW PRIORITY QUEUEs aswell....

replies.body:
modem caught on fire while you were already in low priority queues? hmm curious....

also r u even srs m8? why is you sitting back doing nothing while your team struggles through the horrible perils of being a man down, supposed to make your dc any more justifiable? do u even logic?

also wtf kind of modem catches on fire. if you havent filmed yourself setting it on fire nobody with a logic is going to believe you

also why the fuck are you playing with a modem that could even possibly catch on fire? if you have shitty internet dont fuckin play a game where your presence is absolutely crucial. this isnt counter strike or runescape, dont be so selfish
HAHA, don't let ur flippin modem catch on fire again
I believe one of the teammates was spitting hot fire during his mix tape.
And how many games have you left before that one, I wonder.
Well that's the biggest load of crap I've ever heard. Apparently you don't realise you can't get hit with an LPQ without having left several games.

It's true. If you even want to confirm this you could ask a Rioter. Thats part of the reason I was extremely annoyed. This was the first game i've ever left in Ranked (by pure accident, not raging) and I was hit with 5, 20 minute leaver busters

> If you even want to confirm this you could ask a Rioter.

You realise not a single Rioter would agree with you, right?

> This was the first game i've ever left in Ranked

Except it's not *just* about Ranked, it applies to any match-made game (even Coop VS AI). Not to mention it the only game you *remember* leaving, doesn't mean it hasn't happened before.
Well I have never played Coop VS AI and I have never rage quit a game of Ranked or Normals either so.......Where does it come from then

> Well I have never played Coop VS AI and I have never rage quit a game of Ranked or Normals either so.......Where does it come from then

Well, there's unintentional DCs, something everyone experiences to some extent. Fact is there's no way for the system (or Riot) to differentiate between intentional and unintentional DCs, *however* it does take that into consideration. That's why it takes multiple leaves to initiate an LPQ *but* that doesn't mean someone with a consistently interrupted connection wont be treated any differently from a chronic leaver, as it should be.

You can debate this all you want but until you can get a Rioter to confirm you weren't supposed to get an LPQ, you'll only find people in similar situations agreeing with you (and even then they'd just be making excuses, same as you).
You shouldn't be rewarded for your team carrying your dc'd ass.
